title: Massacre puts spotlight on Florida school safety program
text:
Massacre puts spotlight on Florida school safety program 12:51am GMT - 02:14 
Florida’s Safe Schools program provides millions of dollars to more than 70 school districts for safety and security. Since 2002-03, however, funding for the program has dropped 25 percent per student, even as the threat of mass shootings has risen.   
Florida’s Safe Schools program provides millions of dollars to more than 70 school districts for safety and security. Since 2002-03, however, funding for the program has dropped 25 percent per student, even as the threat of mass shootings has risen.  //reut.rs/2CFbqAB
